results.name: A000120-deficiency of n permuted by A156552: a(n) = A192895(A156552(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..4473
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
program: A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};
xref: Cf. A324101, A324102 (positions of nonnegative and negative terms).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 19 2019
